A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a shit-show. Complete propaganda\, worst than the prequels. And one scene in particular was just... revolting - someone screamed \"What The F*ck?\" during it. The story is as half-assed as a fanfiction. Half of the movie was completely useless except for saying \"oh look at this one character\, she has a huge sad story oh no she was a slave\" but she is an unlikable character so nobody really cared. They should have never made a new trilogy.
